sentences.sentence: Suddenly, she could see the possibilities. Maybe he did have acromegaly.
sentences.translation: 忽然之间，他觉得有这种可能，他可能真的患有先端肥大症。

sentences.sentence: Pigs Tiqu short and short, black hair, white lips and individual acromegaly white.
sentences.translation: 香猪体躯短而矮小，被毛全黑，个别有唇白和肢端白。

sentences.sentence: Acromegaly causes swelling of the soft tissues - in this case around the nose and mouth.
sentences.translation: 先端肥大症会造成鼻子和嘴周围软组织肿大。
